title: Afghanistan's Kabul Basin Faces Major Water Challenges ts

und.value: [caption id="attachment_181" align="alignleft" width="300" caption="USGS personnel researching water resource issues in Afghanistan"][/caption] Population growth in the Kabul Basin, Afghanistan, due in part to returning refugees, is estimated to lead to a six-fold increase in drinking water needs by 2057. The USGS has worked in partnership with the Afghanistan Geological Survey to address questions of future water availability. Read more details
